predicate.note: Frames file for 'scribble' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 25.2.

roleset.name: draw/write untidily

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: He sipped tea sweetened with honey from his high-backed leather chair at his bench, while *trace* scribbling notes ordering spectators to stop whispering or to take off their hats in his courtroom.
example.arg: notes ordering spectators to stop whispering or to take off their hats in his courtroom
